name: WhackyTactics
description:
Made for Miz Jam 1.

Simple 2D game. Map is randomly generated each time.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Move pointer

Space / Enter - Pick a unit / Interact

T - End turn

P - Pause

[+] / [-]  - Zoom in or out

When a unit is picked, you can move the pointer and press [Interact] button to set unit's destination. Each unit has a maximum distance it can travel. 

Each tile has a distance a unit must travel to pass through:

 House - 3

 Grass - 4

 Pine - 6

 Water - 7

 Striped Pine - 8

There are 4 types of units:

 Knight - All stats are average 

 Peasant -  Average helath, lower than average attack, higher than average distance

 Tank - Higher than average health, lower than average attack, lower than average distance

 Scout - Lower than average health, highest attack, highest distance

When a unit stops, it's inventory appears. 

You can use it by moving your pointer to it and pressing [Interact] button.

 Sword - Attack

 Bottle - Heal, can be used up to 2 times in a battle

 Hourglass - Wait

When you pick the attack function, you must pick a direction of attack. If there's an enemy in the direction of your attack, it will be hit.

There are also few pieces of cheese on the map.  Cheese will heal your units when they pass through it.

When you end your turn, beasts move. They can move, hit your units and destroy cheese.
